record.title: APPOINTMENT
record.chair: For the information of the Senate, the Chair makes the following announcement:
record.narrative: (The remarks of Mr. THUNE and Mr. SALAZAR pertaining to the introduction of S. 331 are located in today's RECORD under "Statements on Introduced Bills and Joint Resolutions.")

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I yield the floor, and I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
